video_prompt: A sheer curtain sways gently in a breeze through an open window. Beyond, rose blossoms subtly shift, and distant trees shimmer under a clear sky.
image_prompt: "Dreamy, elegant vertical shot: Open window with swaying white sheer curtain, light-colored multi-pane molding. Beyond, a vibrant rose garden densely packed with white roses and deep green foliage. Softly blurred distant green trees under a clear sky. A signature 'c29' in the bottom right corner. Serene, fresh atmosphere of a gentle spring/summer day."
